mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_commodity (comId, comName, comQuantity, comQuantityNow, comEachPrice, comDescription, comPicture) VALUE (#{comId}, #{comName}, #{comQuantity}, #{comQuantityNow}, #{comEachPrice}, #{comDescription}, #{comPicture})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_commodity WHERE comQuantityNow = 0 AND comId IN ( SELECT comId FROM rel_user_commodity WHERE userName = #{userName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_commodity
comName = #{comName},
comQuantity = #{comQuantity},
comQuantityNow = #{comQuantityNow},
comEachPrice = #{comEachPrice},
comDescription = #{comDescription},
comPicture = #{comPicture},
WHERE comId = #{comId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_commodity WHERE comName like '%${comName}%'
